comments:
Build ID:  I20060602-1317

Steps To Reproduce:
I'm currently trying to work on birt viewer version20060927. BuildViewer.xml has been successfully been build but i got errors while trying to build on BuildWebViewer.xml. the error is as shown below: I have servlet.jar in both plugins dependencies and  org.eclipse.birt.report.viewer/birt/WEB-INF/lib/servlet.jar.
How  to solve? help
